characteristics.name: for you
characteristics.description: A system that prioritizes user attention, often for commercial gain.

options.description: Prioritizes user engagement over user well-being.
Strikes a balance between user attention and commercial interests.

characteristics.name: AI Usage
characteristics.description: A user's perspective on AI's role in their life.

options.description: Sees AI as a tool to enhance their productivity and well-being.
Believes AI should be used with caution, prioritizing human autonomy.

characteristics.name: Attention Management
characteristics.description: A user's approach to managing their attention.

options.description: Uses time-management techniques like Pomodoro to stay focused.
Blocks distracting content or apps to minimize attention-seeking interactions.

characteristics.name: Digital Freedom
characteristics.description: A user's perception of AI's impact on their digital freedom.

options.description: Believes AI erodes their sense of agency and autonomy.
Sees AI as a means to protect and enhance their digital freedom.

characteristics.name: Information Overload
characteristics.description: A user's perspective on information consumption.

options.description: Feels overwhelmed by the sheer volume of available information.
Sees opportunities in the vast amounts of information and strives to learn from it.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: A user's approach to social interactions.

options.description: Tends to act on impulse, prioritizing straightforward communication.
Casts a wider net, seeking deeper connections and subtlety in their interactions.

characteristics.name: Personal Growth
characteristics.description: A user's focus on personal development.

options.description: Feels comfortable with their current state, prioritizing relaxation over change.

characteristics.name: Value Alignment
characteristics.description: A user's perspective on the values they strive to uphold.

options.description: Prioritizes genuine, authentic experiences and relationships.
Feels influenced by external factors, seeking validation through others.
